column1: | mrs. ora boykin carroll was born on august 21
column2: 1921 and departed this life on june 10
column3: 2015. mrs. carroll's remains will lie in state on monday
column5: 2015 from 1:00 pm until 6:00 pm at small's mortuary

column13: al. dignified and professional services entrusted to small's mortuary
